name: Vs. Karate Creeper 1.0
description:
STORY

one day karate creeper was relaxing at a red temple in Japan minding his own business, he then heard a high pitched beep sound and when he looked behind him he saw it was the unbeatable rapper boyfriend and his girlfriend too! boyfriend challenged karate creeper in a few rap battles, karate creeper then approved boyfriend's request and they start singing

Credits

sony - made the theme of pizza (it is literally from the spiderman 2 game)

raepraeplol - model_6768844956's inspiration

marstarbro - made original endless

srperez - made original thunderstorm
